title: Setup project
description: Setup the project structure and dependencies.

title: Develop main feature
description: Develop the main feature of the application.

title: Create START rule and implementation
short_description: Create the START.md rule file explaining the MemoryBank system and implement the corresponding START rule logic on the server to initialize the agent's context.
detailed_description:
1. Create a new file at `.cursor/rules/START.md`.
2. The file should explain the overall architecture: MemoryBank, MyMCP server, and MemoryBank MCP server, and how the workflow starts.
3. Implement a `START` command/rule in the MemoryBank server.
4. This command should load `projectBrief.md` and `techContext.md`.
5. It should also load the agent's last state from memory (the 'active context').
6. It should then return all this information to the agent to initialize its session.
description: Create the START.md rule file explaining the MemoryBank system and implement the corresponding START rule logic on the server to initialize the agent's context.

title: Add user request form to Streamlit UI
short_description: Add a text input and a button to the main Streamlit page to allow users to submit new requests to the userbrief.
detailed_description:
1. Modify the main Streamlit page (`.cursor/memory-bank/streamlit_app/Home.py`).
2. Add a text area for the user to write their request.
3. Add a 'Submit' button.
4. On button click, the request should be sent to the MemoryBank MCP server and added to the `userbrief.md` file. This will require creating a new tool `add_user_request` on the MemoryBank server to handle the creation of a new entry in `userbrief.md`.
description: Add a text input and a button to the main Streamlit page to allow users to submit new requests to the userbrief.
